xal.extension.orbit

Class CoordinateMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • xal.extension.orbit.CoordinateMap

  • public class CoordinateMap
extends java.lang.Object
    maps coordinates from two nodes to a third node

    • Constructor Detail

      • CoordinateMap

        public CoordinateMap(AcceleratorNode targetNode,
                     AcceleratorNode nodeA,
                     AcceleratorNode nodeB,
                     Trajectory<TransferMapState> trajectory,
                     AcceleratorSeq sequence)
        Primary Constructor
        Parameters:
        targetNode - accelerator node for which we wish to get the coordinates
        nodeA - first accelerator node for which we have a position
        nodeB - second accelerator node for which we have a position
        trajectory - initial online model trajectory to use for generating the maps to the target node
        sequence - accelerator sequence which is necessary to handle the ring correctly

      • CoordinateMap

        public CoordinateMap(AcceleratorNode targetNode,
                     AcceleratorNode nodeA,
                     AcceleratorNode nodeB,
                     Trajectory<TransferMapState> trajectory)
        Constructor suitable for a linear sequence
        Parameters:
        targetNode - accelerator node for which we wish to get the coordinates
        nodeA - first accelerator node for which we have a position
        nodeB - second accelerator node for which we have a position
        trajectory - online model trajectory to use for generating the maps to the target node
